name: Ernesto Gomez
text: DJ Boots did an awesome job. The music was great and he had us on our feet dancing all night! I highly recommend DJ Boots. 5 star rating :star:. Thank you DJ Boots

name: Ruben Guzman
text: Had the honor of helping coordinate a huge event this weekend. I have to say DJ Boots was amazing! 5 star service. Book him for your next event.

name: Perla Gomez
text: DJ Boots is an awesome dj! I highly and truly recommend him

name: Carmen Baker
text: Thank you DJ Boots for going the extra mile with the music. My husband was very happy! :heart:
